attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been almost 30 years since 'The Equal Pay Act' came into force yet still women in full-time employment earn on average 18% less than men in their hourly wage. 

Each week men take home approximately 26% more earnings, whilst women on average receive three-quarters less. 

This discrimination is disgraceful and we need to stop it!!!
